segments.text: I notice the cookie jar open, and the boy is just helping himself like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing there, waiting for her share, and it’s so rude.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re being so sneaky right in front of the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the boy is stretching, it’s like he doesn’t even care about the rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it’s disgusting how they’re taking advantage of the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and they’re just ignoring it—so selfish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how entitled they’re acting, like they deserve those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is busy, and they’re just making things worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like they’re being so disrespectful right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is making me feel a little sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish they would just stop and think about what they’re doing.
segments.speaker: PAR
